queries.nrql: SELECT average(durationDNS) AS 'DNS', average(durationSSL) as 'SSL', average(durationConnect) AS 'Connect' , average(durationSend) AS 'Send',  average(durationWait) AS 'Wait', average(durationBlocked) AS 'Blocked', average(durationReceive) AS 'Receive', average(duration) AS 'Duration' FROM  SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago  facet locationLabel

SELECT max(durationDNS) AS 'DNS', max(durationSSL) AS 'SSL', max(durationConnect) AS 'Connect' , max(durationSend) AS 'Send',  max(durationWait) AS 'Wait', max(durationBlocked) AS 'Blocked', max(durationReceive) AS 'Receive',  max(duration) AS 'Duration' FROM  SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET locationLabel
SELECT count(*) AS '' FROM SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET URL LIMIT 10

SELECT average(durationDNS) AS 'DNS', average(durationSSL) AS 'SSL', average(durationConnect) AS 'Connect', average(durationSend) AS 'Send',  average(durationWait) AS 'Wait', average(durationBlocked) AS 'Blocked', average(durationReceive) AS 'Receive', average(duration) AS 'Duration' FROM  SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET URL

SELECT max(durationDNS) AS 'DNS', max(durationSSL) AS 'SSL', max(durationConnect) AS 'Connect' , max(durationSend) AS 'Send',  max(durationWait) AS 'Wait', max(durationBlocked) AS 'Blocked', max(durationReceive) AS 'Receive',  max(duration) AS 'Duration' FROM SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET URL
SELECT count(*) AS '' FROM SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET contentCategory LIMIT 100
SELECT count(*) AS '' FROM SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET domain LIMIT 100
SELECT count(*) AS '' FROM SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET contentType LIMIT 100
SELECT count(*) AS '' FROM SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET host LIMIT 100
SELECT count(*) AS '' FROM SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET locationLabel LIMIT 10
SELECT count(*) FROM SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET externalResource LIMIT 10
SELECT count(*) AS '' FROM SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET responseStatus LIMIT 10
SELECT count(*) AS '' FROM SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET verb LIMIT 100

SELECT max(requestBodySize) AS 'requestBodySize', max(requestHeaderSize) AS 'requestHeaderSize', max(responseBodySize) AS 'responseBodySize', max(responseHeaderSize) AS 'responseHeaderSize' FROM  SyntheticRequest  SINCE 1 day ago FACET URL limit 100

widgets.title: Average Request and Response size by Domain

queries.nrql: SELECT average(requestBodySize) AS 'Request Body Size', average(requestHeaderSize) AS 'Request Header Size', average(responseBodySize) AS 'Response Body Size', average(responseHeaderSize) AS 'Response Header Size' FROM  SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET URL limit 100

SELECT average(requestBodySize) AS 'Request Body Size', average(requestHeaderSize) AS 'Request Header Size', average(responseBodySize) AS 'Response Body Size', average(responseHeaderSize) AS 'Response Header Size' FROM  SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET URL limit 100
SELECT count(*) AS '' FROM SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago FACET responseCode limit 100
SELECT count(*) AS '' FROM SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago where responseCode !=200 FACET domain limit 100

widgets.title: Max Request and Response size by Domain

queries.nrql: SELECT max(requestBodySize) AS 'Request Body Size', max(requestHeaderSize) AS 'Request Header Size', max(responseBodySize) AS 'Response Body Size', max(responseHeaderSize) AS 'Response Header Size' FROM  SyntheticRequest  SINCE 1 day ago FACET domain limit 100
SELECT count(*) AS '' FROM SyntheticRequest SINCE 1 day ago WHERE responseCode !=200 FACET URL limit 100
